column1: '''''Þorgils Saga ok Hafliða''''' is volume three in the Oxford English Monographs series. [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] was one of the General Editors for the series. In the introduction Brown thanks Tolkien for his "valuable criticism and advice".<ref name=TB>[http://www.tolkienbooks.net/php/details.php?reference=95200 Þorgils Saga ok Hafliða 1952] at [http://www.tolkienbooks.net/ An Illustrated Tolkien Bibliography] (accessed 27 April 2011)</ref>
